dc_description_s: City of Houston land parcel information (ownership, value, number of stories etc.); information from the Houston assessor's office.  This theme contains HCAD account numbers and most commonly used attributes pertaining to released COHGIS parcel coverages. The themes can be used for Site Address geocoding and Owner Mailing Address geocoding.  They are stored as points. This theme was generated using the data provided by HCAD in May 2003 with some updates since then.  This data is part of the 2004 City of Houston GIS Release 10 available in the GIS Lab in Rotch Library.  Other releases available in the Rotch GIS Lab are 1998, 2000, 2002 and 2003.
